text:
Khandu bohot pyara aadmi h, sab kehte the. Jab hum mile, uske baad mei bhi yhi bolta hu.
Yaar, it was pity that we didn't talk before 4th year. Bhai, bohot kam logo se pehli mulakat mei hi connection feel hota h, I felt that with you.
Bhai chaapu to tum ho hi. Just be like this always. 
It was great spending those last few days with u. Hope we meet soon. ğŸ™‚
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Hi abhishek,
We didn't talk much, but you were so sweet whenever we met. Hope you remain the same cheerful, and humble soul. 
And I really hope we meet again ğŸ˜
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Adesh you are one of the best people I met on campus. The way you helped me during Senator elections was very heartwarming. You have a special skill to connect with anyone, pretty easily. I will remember our walks in the last days, yaar campus kitna acha lagta tha shaam koğŸ˜.
Ab aap upsc ki duniya mei utar hi aaye h, to hum jald hi aapka saath dene aate h, bas delhi aa jaanağŸ˜‚. 
Adesh, I have no doubt you are going to ace everything you do, just keep your smile intactğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Are mere bhai. Mujhe to yaad bhi nhi hum first time kahan mile the. But kitni yaaden h apni. mera tujhe lagbhag force krke campaigner banana. Wo yaad h jab second year summer ke liye project lene gye the to kya bakchodi ki thi humneğŸ˜‚ğŸ¤£,aur wo project kuch kaam bhi nhi aayağŸ˜‚. Fir wo internship ka randi rona. And then placements mei tests ke baadğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. 
Yaar you are one of the most genuine person,I met on campus. Aur honest bhi.
Yaar, I can't tell you how good I felt when I got the news of your placement. Being so low after phase 1 placement, and then the way u have worked hard is pretty commendable.
Dobara milte h aur memories banane ke liyeğŸ˜‚.
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Oh.. Bakait
All hail the mighty bakaitğŸ˜‚. 
Bakait you are one of the most hard working person I ever met. We first really talked during the first year summers, remember eco 101.And during that time I understood what people really meant when they talked about you.
During second year summers, seeing you work all day long was mind-boggling. You really inspired us to work harder, which we sadly didn't ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. 
Bakait remember those scooty rides during trips, everybody was hell scared to sit behind you. You need to give me some credit here to show confidence in youğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ¤£. 
The way you train your mind to do difficult work is very commendable,like in those running sessions 
 Bakait, you have got a  sharp mind with even better work ethics. So, just be a bakait always. You are going to be champion in anything you doğŸ˜
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Hi anshu,
Yaad h wo first year ke practice sessions. Tu kitna jyada fit tha yaar(hope you are more fitter than before). You were an very easy guy to talk to. I have really enjoyed my time with you.
Keep shining. Hope we meet soon.
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Yo maisam,
Hum shayad sip ki team mei first time mile the. Aur kitne shi dost bane hum dono. Milte hi sidha connection ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Yaar jaldi hi milte h. Take care
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
hi rajat,
Hum log second year mei hi mile, thanks to vipin. And I was lucky that we met. Yaar, I haven't seen a more helpful and humble guy at iitk. Tum nhi hote to civil ke courses kaise hi nikalte. Remember how much we struggled during internships. Your support was special. And remember how much we have talked during placements, hoping ki bas jaldi se lag jaye. You were a constant motivator during placements. Yaar tumne jitni help ki h, I can't thank you enough. You are a gem of a person.
You are obviously going to do great things in life. Please , be your charming helpful and humble self. 
keep shining.
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Jai shri ram bhai!!!
Yaar kitne paper/quiz/assignments saath  kiye/chaape h. Aur most of the time phati hi rhti thiğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Mote, you are a very helpful soul. Tu saari responsibility le leta tha, agar tujhe kuch na aata hi to bhi(remember ce372 project). Milte h yaar jaldi. Keep in contact.
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Hi Kanishk,
yaad h first year mei hum kitna saath ghume h, and do you remember wo phy 103 wala night out( hum logon ki kitni fati hui thi). Hum logo ne kitna randi rona kiya h papers ke baad, aur most of the cases mei hum dono ke hi halat patli hi hoti thi.  Yaar, you were one of the nicest soul I met at iitk, hum dono ki baat nhi hui h kaafi time se. But we are going to connect soon!! Take care
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Yo kratik,
Yaad h first year mei birthday celebrations mei tu hi dance steps sikhata thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Bro, your support during the Senator elections was very heartwarming. I still remember elections counting wale din tu bolta h, ki aaj subah uth ke maine bhagwan se maanga ki ye dono jeet jaaye,and guess what we wonğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Yaar tera calm aura is what I admire most.
You are a gem of a person. Keep shining. Hope we will remain in contact.
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
During orientation, the first time we met in the hall 2 quad; Krishan: Mujhe UPSC ka tyaari krna h. After 4 years finally turned out that he did tons of more things than just preparing for upsc. 
Your randi rona after every civil course's quiz/exam was funny and may be disturbing a few times. I know maine tere bohot maze liye h, but yahi to baate baad mei yaad ayengi.
Cheers to a great career and a very fulfilling life. Aur haan , upsc nikal ke bhul mat jaana :) .
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Are uncle,
Aapse pehle din hi mulakat hui hogi. But, kahan pata tha us time ki ek chaapu, calm, extraordinary focused bande ke bhai ban rhe h. You have made me look fool in all those assignments that were a cakewalk for you. Aur fir aap mere stupid doubts bhi itni aaram se samjhate the. You can be a very good teacher.
I remember you hated hss courses in the first year, aur ab aapne jitna diverse topics padha h utna kam hi logo ne padha hoga.
Uncle you have this extraordinary trait of giving everything to a task until you succeed. I have seen you letting no stone unturned while preparing for exams. Continue this attitude. 
Ab se jaafi cheezon pe discuss krna h. à¤‰à¤®à¥à¤®à¥€à¤¦ h jald à¤®à¥à¤²à¤¾à¤•à¤¾à¤¤ à¤¹à¥‹à¤—à¥€.

text:
Re mudit,
Hamari Nikhil ki wajah se hi mulakat hui hogi. Fir to kaafi lamba saath rha, Civil ke courses, internship time aur fir placement ka randi ronağŸ˜‚. Yaar, kisne socha tha hum pehle 2 din mei hi nikal jayengeğŸ˜‚. Yaar, tere ko kaam krna aata h, chahe kaise bhi ho you finish the task at hand. Aur wo tumhari witty smile gajab h yaar.
Miltr h jald hi. Chalo take carr
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
hi mukku,
hum log first year se hi ek doosre ko jaante h. But thanks to last 1.5 months, we have spent a lot of time together. Yaar I have always been amazed of your focus(matlab sab ke saath room mei baith ke bhi, tum apne kaam me gum ho jaate the). You are an hardworking guy, but with mood swings . and the repercussions doesn't really matter to you once you decide something. You have a very good heart and are an even better friend. Friendships krni tumse seekhi chahiye, matlab tumhara dedication hi gajab rhta h.
Hopefully gurgaon mei jald milenge. Aur haan, upsc ki tyaari to aap hi kara rhe h hamari. Chalo... take care.
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Oh mere bhai.
Yaad hai election result wale din jab hum jeet gye the to teri aankhon mei aansoon the, you were way more happy than i was. That is the top most moment of my IITK life. Bhai tu meri har achievement mei mere se jyada khush hota h. Chahe wo sg banna ho, Senator ya placement. Yaar I am very very lucky that I found you.
Acha hi hua hamari 12th mei baat nhi hui, we were smarter more matured individuals when we met.
Bhai tu bohot passionate h, isi passion ko work environment mei daal de, tu kisi bhi cheez mei chaap dega. Bas sirf emotions mei decisions mat lenağŸ˜›. 
Yaar I really hope you achieve whatever you want to. 
Hum to pakka milne wale h, ab to life bhar ka saath h janemanğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.
Bhai forever....
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
I am very humbled and overjoyed by your memoir. But the downside was that you covered pretty much all the major incidentsğŸ˜‚. So i need to put on my storyteller hat nowğŸ˜œ
So my friend, brother, guide, inspiration motivator and hopefully we can add more things here in future.

I thought about when we met or when we became friends, and i also don't remember thatğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.
Straight to the point now 
You have always inspired me with your work ethics, I remember you living almost perfect(in terms of utilisation of time) life during first year summer. Then during the internship season (ok..,I accept we didn't work hard enough ), but you still utilized your time better. Then do you remember development economics midsem , you had read everything and then you taught me(now please don't take your mind to grades) . I was amazed to listen your internship story, the kind of hard work you did was extraordinary. 

You have been a constant support right through. Without you people I would have never stood for the Senator. Do you remember, I was thinking of taking back my nomination and you simply asked what is the worst thing that could happen if I fight. You have  a niche' of saying right things at right timeğŸ˜‚. 
You were a great support during the lockdown and placement process. You were the one who told me about zerodha and kaggle. Without these I would surely not have been at Blackrock.
I have always loved the kind of connection you make with people. You put efforts for the friendships to work(I should also say relationships to workğŸ˜›). I really hope I learn this from you. 

Very thankful for that day when you asked all of us to sing solo(you people were a very good audience, I Would have surely laughed if I was in the audience ğŸ˜‚). I always thought about starting to write and thankfully I wrote my first à¤¶à¤¾à¤¯à¤°à¥€ that day. Whenever I am going to do my first performance, you are going to have a special mention 
On the storytelling part, I have been making stories from 11th class, it was just that for the first time I had an audience ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

When I came to IITK, having very good friends was at the top of my list. And how lucky I am that we met. You were our only photographer in all the trips, you slept with us on train floor in front of toilet(remember thatğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚!!!!). You planned all the things we did in last 1.5 months. You are the glue of our group, you keep everyone together. You have this ability of thinking about the group before yourself.  Again, commendable!!! 

You are going to excel in anything that you do, but i really hope you find clarity soon. (And please don't overthink after making that decision)
I know, I haven't talked about relationships here (sorry ğŸ˜‚, à¤…à¤¬ à¤¶à¤¾à¤¦à¥€ à¤•à¥€ à¤‰à¤®à¥à¤° à¤¹à¥ˆ à¤¤à¥à¤®à¥à¤¹à¤¾à¤°à¥€)

And yes... Remember those endless discussions we had about issues India faces,we are surely going to work on them. So, take your life path accordingly ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.

Thanks for making me a better human being.
Love.....
Chalo..... Badhiya(Bear hug) ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Shashi Shekhar

P. S. à¤¤à¥à¤® à¤¬à¤¡à¤¼à¥‡ à¤ªà¥à¤¯à¤¾à¤°à¥‡ à¤†à¤¦à¤®à¥€ à¤¹à¥‹ à¤¬à¥‡ |

text:
Hi prince,
I don't remember when we met. But, I vividly remember our talks during 2nd year summers(modi won elections againğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚), we spent a lot of time together in the next semesters. You are a very helpful being, there are very few as helpful and selfless as you. We have talked extensively during lockdown and placement. Your support really meant a lot.
The way you conducted elections even when you were so low, tells about your strong character and will power. 
You are obviously going to become an IAS. 
 Remember, you always have a friend to talk to. Let's meet soon.
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Are sir...
Aapke bina sg wala tenure kaise jaata. I was lucky ki hum dono ko ek hi wing mili. 
The warmth with which you meet and talk to people is pretty extraordinary. Got to learn a lot from you. From time management to clarity in decision making.
It was honour being in contact with you. Hope we can meet at some point of life. 
You are going to do extraordinary things in life, ofc. Chalo... Take care
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Hi lambi,
It is very difficult to write a memoir for a person with whom you have spent most time.. xd!. Do you remember by the time orientation ended. we both were as if we have known for ages. Hum dono ne kitna kuch saath kiya h( ok.. in most of these I forced you ) .Remember blood donation camp, kanpur marathon, antaragani pr, tera bilkul man nhi tha. But, this was the best thing about you, you never said no. Yaad h tune to apna room change hi kar liya tha in 1st year, Shi bakchodi hoti thi ( rishi ne tujhe romantic movie dikhayi thi .. xD., aur teri shaadi...) . We were going to become roommates in 2nd year, but I guess it happened for best. Our friendship hasn't been any short of roller coaster ride. Bc, Maine jitna tujhe manaya h, utna kisi  ladki ko manata to pakka pat jaati. But, here comes your best trait, you have  such a tender heart, and you are such an emotional guy, ki last tk aate aate to ulta teri tension hone lag gyi thi..xD. 
Yaar, we both have been together in some difficult situations be it during internships, then lockdown, and then placements( har test ke baad randi rona krte the...xD). Thanks for being a constant support and partner during these times... Aur haan, jab teri placement nhi lag rhi thi, I was very stressed ki tu chod na de, but the way u handled yourself was lovely,<3. Bohot acha hua ki lockdown ho gya, nhi to hum log ludo hi khel rhe hote placement ke bhi time...xD.
Movies/ tv series- When we first met, I thought ki preparation ke baad aaya h to isliye itna interest hoga, but the kind of dedication,you showed for this, itne mei to pakka dassa aa jaata...xD. During 1st year you used to be 7 hrs on the field, and the rest of time on your laptop( i have never been able to understand how u could do it). Yaad h tune aur piyush ne compete kiya GOT khatam krne ke liye( tu hi jeeta hoga most probably).. Now , i have understood this, movies hobbies(...xD) nhi h lamba ki, they are integral part of u.
Sports- During the first year I was shocked to see ,how can someone have six pack abs without gym. But,you have always been athletic and zero figure. ..xD. The shine in your eyes and the change in your body language while you are playing is very pleasing to see. The energy that you put in sports is just mindboggling. You could play for 8-10 hrs a day. Starting a game in second year, and to become captain in 3rd year, is an astounding achievement. Yaar, mai to abhi bhi kh rha. professionally sports mei chala ja. You would be way happier. 
Yaar last 1.5 months with you was pure gold. Our photo sessions were lit. And that music event. ooh really sorry I laughed..xD. The way you keep the things clean, and in order in an aberration from college rooms( tu kitna emotional tha isko leke, teri aadhi fights logo se isi pe hui hogi). 
Good bye to apna hoga nhi, abhi to teri shaadi bhi karwani h(waise tujhe ke leni chahiye by rajasthan standards..xD). Aur,I am already saying sorry for the things I say/do when we are in gurgaon. We are obviously going to have a lot of fun whenever we get there. 
Chal milte haan jaldi hi. Is baar to dassa pakka aa rha hoga, nhi....xD. 
Love you brother.....
P.S. More power to u for random messaging girls....
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Yo tandon,
Yaar, hamari baatein kab start hui pata nhi. Aur baad mei hamari ramdom topics pe jitni baatei hui uska bhi koi coubt nhiğŸ˜‚. Yaar, wo ek doosre ke satires aur double meanings pe hasne ka maja hi alag tha.

author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Hi rishi,
Ok , teri tarah hi start krta hu. You were the first guy I met. First impression? Topper h, maggu hoga(how wrong I was at that point of time) aur egoist bhi( I guess I am not good at judging people). We were the only 1st year people in hall 2 who were living in double sharing(thanks to vipin). Yaar, I was so blessed that you were my roommate in my 1st year. Tune pura 1st year friends dekh ke nikala h, yaad h. Tu maggu to bilkul bhi nhi nikala, ulta mujhe lagta tha ki khi fakka na lag jaye( but aap jaise chapu kitne hi h). Pata h log bolte the, ki rishi bohot arrogant h. Unko kya hi pata tha ki tera koi filter hi nhi h. You were one the most honest and straight forward guy I met. Yaar wo night out with raman was class. Hum log first year mei har jagah saath hi gye h. Aur wo lucknow trip( tujhe kitni pyaas lagti thi yaar). Aur haan, koi banda itna time kaise nahta h( tujhe 45 min lagte the). Aur yaad h jis din tu nahta tha us din tu pura room saaf krta that( it was sad ki wo din jyada nhi aaye). Yaar I loved, you debating on controversial topics, tera sochne ka tarika hi bilkul different hota tha. 
Yaar milna to h hi. I really hope you find something that challenges you intellectually and you solve that problem. Extraordinary people like you take the humanity forward(in terms of technological innovation).
 Aur to bas ta ta my ever confident,chill, first roomie.
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Hi shashank,
Ab hum jaante to hamesha se the ek doosre ko. Hall mei kaafi milna hua, fir wo trip. But shi se to à¤¬à¤¾à¤¤à¥‡à¤‚ final year mei hi hui. I was so so lucky ki hum mile. Ab tum nhi hote to mai shayari kaise likhta. 
Tum na hote to, us din dumbs charades mei act kaise krta. Yaar, tum mei talent ko pehchanne ki to kabiliyat hğŸ˜‚. Wo last night light story telling session was love. Aur yaad jab aab log chale gye the meri wing se, to mai, tum mukesh aur sameer, Kya shi time beeta wo.
Ab to aap motu bhi nhi rheğŸ˜, gajab ka motivation dikhaye yaar tum. Tumhare jaise dost kahan hi milte h. Aise hi rhna. 
Ab mil to rhe hi h, to good bye to kya hi bole. Chalo... Take care.

text:
Hi tripathi ji,
Hum log 3rd year mei baat krne lge honge. Pehle to kaafi arrogant lgte the, but baad kuch kaafi serious conversation hui. Yaar gajab hard working aur focused bande ho tum. Yaad h maine tumse pucha tha ki upsc nhi to kya. Aur tum bole kuch nhi. Isi confidence ko maintain rkhna.
Pure y17 batch ko degree milwane mei tumhara kaafi bada haath h. Baad mei bhi logo ki aise hi help krna.
Bc tumhare jitne confidence se pj sunate kisi ko nhi dekha. Milte h to ek do aur sunana xD.
Ab aap IAS to ban hi rhe h, to pehle hi badhayi de de rha.

Yaad hum log 1st year mei saath hi baithe the, aur same marks bhi aate the.. xD. Yaad h wo specially hall 10 jaana, hum 2-3 baar to chale gye honge. Yaar, kitne shi dost ban gye the, nhi.
Chal milte h jald hi. Take care
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Are sir!!
Thanks to psychology courses, kaafi interaction ho gya tha hamara. First year mei hi tumko dekh lag gya tha, ki ye banda pakka chapega. Yaar tumhari work ethics otherworldly h. It was sad ki hum logo ke doosre topics pe jyada interaction nhi hue.
Please maintain the single minded focus you have to do things.
 Of course, you are going to be a great researcher. I would be waiting for the breakthrough innovations you are going to do.
Hope we meet soon
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Hi Vipin,
My guardian, counsellor, brother and a lovely roomie.
Oh.. Vipin the way we talked when we first met, I never thought you would face the problems that you faced. Now when I think, I guess we connected the moment we met. Okay, really sorry for not understanding the gravity of the situation that u were in.  Respect for the way you came back(more on this later). Asking you to become my roommate in 2nd year, was the best decision I took. (I guess I have always been blessed...xD)
I used to think, that I have a lot of unnecessary drama in my life, and then I met you. I have seen you face every strange kind of problem a person could face( remember the struggle every sem during pre reg. or add drop, the laptop issue, you taking unnecessary difficult courses, and now the pg roll no.). So many experiences for a college life...xD).
You have always supported me, in everything I have done, listened to all the crazy ideas and theories that just keep coming into my mind(You are a very good listener). You have given me a feeling of home, a person with whom, I have shared everything( you are very good at keeping secrets). You have scolded me whenever I have lost my path( I loved it).  You never talked when I used to meditate. You have this exceptional trait of giving everyone space to grow and express. 
The hard work and energy that you would put in everything was exceptional, you would just keep studying until you understand the concept. I was always in awe of the calmness that you exhibited during exams(studying at 4 am in the morning ,still trying to understand concepts instead of remembering them) , remember you once got addicted to rolls( a strange addiction i would say), you are an excellent critic of movies. Your love for suspense thriller took you to Korean movies/shows. And remember u watched korean shows in the middle of exams. Oh. those were crazy times
I haven't seen anyone grown more than you in the past 4 years. Starting from an hindi medium background, struggling to understand the lectures in 1st yer to doing a minor in English literature. Struggling to talk / interact with people in the 1st year, to your present confident self. who would give these excellent 1 liners. A person who was going to leave IITK, to the present self who is going with a dual degree. A person needing psychological help in the first year to the present self ,who can counsel anyone.
Vipin, I know we are going to be friends for life. The way u supported me during internship time,lockdown and placement was very heartwarming. .
Brother, I am always there in every situation u need me. Just call/meet and yes, don't overthink.
I am never going to say goodbye to u.  I have no doubt, you are going to do great things in life. Always be your calm ,confident self. 
Love you brother...
And yes keep calling me....
author: Shashi  Shekhar

text:
Yaar, kya bakchod group bana tha hum logo ka. Bc kisi ko kaam hi nhi krna thağŸ˜‚. But kaafi kuch seekha maine us time. So thanks for that.
P. S. Yaar itna fraud kaise maar skte ho yaar tumğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.
Chalo... Take care
